titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I finished the charge for the Ordinandi, walked in the Park with the dogs: & dined with the candidates. Knight gave the address at Evensong.
Two of the acknowledgements of my book were interesting, the one from Sir Lewis Dibden, the other from Athelstan Riley.
